T02D1731:96b-0: @96b * // sgrol ma ral gcig ma'i blo 'phel bzhugs /
T02D1731:96b-2: # // 'phags ma sgrol ma rdo rje dbyangs can ma //
T02D1731:96b-3: ba lim gtor ma phul ba bzhes nas su //
T02D1731:96b-4: 'gro rnams ma rig mun pa bsal nas su //
T02D1731:96b-5: shes rab blo yi padma kha 'byed shog / dmar
T02D1731:96b-6: mo rab 'jigs nam mkha'i mdog / zhal gcig phyag
T02D1731:96b-8: mi shes yid 'joms la btud de //
T02D1731:96b-9: gzhung don sgom rim 'di gsal bya //
T02D1731:96b-10: dang po kho nar rig pa dang ldan pa'i gang zag gis //
T02D1731:96b-11: dur khrod dam phyi nang gi rten stobs ldan bzhugs pa'am /
T02D1731:96b-12: rab tu dga' zhing dben pa'i sa phyogs su gnas khang byi dor bya //
T02D1731:96b-13: rten dang mchod pa dngos sam yid kyi rnam 'phrul gyis bkod de /
T02D1731:96b-14: bu chung gi ro 'jam zhing mnyen pa dri zhim po'i chus bkrus la /
T02D1731:96b-15: me tog gi phreng ba btags la /
T02D1731:96b-16: rang nyid bde bar gnas pa'am /
T02D1731:96b-17: de med na yang stan 'bol ba la gnas te /
T02D1731:96b-18: bdag gis ral gcig ma bsgrubs la /
T02D1731:96b-19: rang gzhan gyi mi shes pa'i mun pa rnam par gzhom par bya'o snyam du bsam mo //
T02D1731:96b-20: de nas skad cig gis rnam pa kun tu rtog
T02D1731:96b-21: pa'i tshogs rang sar dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la
T02D1731:96b-28: h'um sngon po dang gsum shin tu gsal bar blta zhing /
T02D1731:96b-29: 'od zer gyi tshogs spros pas 'gro ba'i mi shes
T02D1731:96b-30: pa'i mun pa rnam par bcom nas gnas gsum gyi
T02D1731:96b-32: sku gsung thugs rnam par dag cing 'pho 'gyur med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1731:96b-33: dngos po'am mtshan ma thams cad rang gi ngo bos
T02D1731:96b-34: stong pa'i don de nyid blta bar bya ba'i phyir
T02D1731:96b-35: / aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a ba a'atma konyaham /
T02D1731:97a-0: dngos po dang mtshan ma'i bag la nyal phra mo tsam yang med pa'i ting nge 'dzin @97a * //
T02D1731:97a-2: de'i ngang las a'a:dang t'am rim gyis gyur pa las /
T02D1731:97a-3: padma dmar po dang thod pa khrag gis bkang ba //
T02D1731:97a-4: de'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la h'um sngo zhing dangs pa la blta bar bya'o //
T02D1731:97a-5: h'um yongs su gyur pa las gri gug gi yu ba nas nyi ma'i steng na h'um gnas pa' //
T02D1731:97a-6: de yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig ma sku sbom zhing thung ba /
T02D1731:97a-7: mdog bee d'ur+ya ltar sngo zhing dangs pa /
T02D1731:97a-9: dang po gnyis ral gri dang autpala bsnams pa /
T02D1731:97a-10: 'og ma gnyis gri gug dang thod khrag thugs kar 'dzin pa /
T02D1731:97a-11: zhabs g-yas bskum g-yon brkyang bas dbugs bral gyi snying dang rkang ba mnan pa /
T02D1731:97a-15: klu brgyad sprul sngon po'i gzugs kyis dbu rgyan dang /
T02D1731:97a-22: se ral kha rnams kyis rab tu dpa' ba'i chas su zhugs pa /
T02D1731:97a-23: spyi gtsug na thub pa mi bskyod pa bzhugs pa /
T02D1731:97a-24: spyan gsum me mngag ltar dmar zhing la 'khrug ba cung zad g-yon du gzigs pa /
T02D1731:97a-26: gang rgyangs chen po sgrogs pa /
T02D1731:97a-27: phyi nang gi bdud thams cad rlag par byed par bsgom mo //
T02D1731:97a-28: de'i thugs kar padma dmar po 'dab ma bzhi pa'i
T02D1731:97a-29: steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i h'um
T02D1731:97a-31: mdun gyi 'dab ma nas g-yas skor du /
T02D1731:97a-32: hr'im trim h'um phat rnams bsgom zhing yig 'bru de
T02D1731:97a-33: dag las dpag tu med pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs
T02D1731:97a-34: 'phros pas 'gro ba'i mi shes pa'i mun pa thams
T02D1731:97a-36: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan
T02D1731:97a-37: blo gros kyi snang ba thams cad tshur 'dus te
T02D1731:97a-38: rang la bstim zhing bdag nyid yon tan dang blo
T02D1731:97a-39: gros kyi snang ba thams cad phun sum tshogs pas
T02D1731:97a-41: de nas bzlas pa bya ste /
T02D1731:97a-42: g-yas dang po'i ral gri mi rus kyi phreng bar bsgyur la /
T02D1731:97a-43: thugs padma nyi mar rig sngags kyi ting nge 'dzin
T02D1731:97b-0: la ma g-yos pa'i dang las @97b hr'im trim h'um
T02D1731:97b-1: phad ces ci nus bzlas so //
T02D1731:97b-2: de las skyo na pad 'dab kyi yi ge h'um la bsdu /
T02D1731:97b-3: bdag gzhan gyi blo gros ngan pa'i mun pa thams
T02D1731:97b-4: cad gtan nas dag par gyur cig snyam pa'i smon
T02D1731:97b-6: rjes shes kyi skabs su yang rtag tu dpa' mo'i nga rgyal dang ma bral bar bya'o //
T02D1731:97b-8: brtan zhing tshad du skyol gyur na //
T02D1731:97b-9: mi shes sprin tshogs dpag med rnams //
T02D1731:97b-10: dbyar zad bzhin du dengs par 'gyur //
T02D1731:97b-11: sgrol ma'i blo 'phel slob dpon klu sgrub kyi man
T02D1731:97b-12: ngag snyan dngags mkhan rtag pa rdo rjes tshig le'ur
T02D1731:97b-13: byas pa / rgya gar shar phyogs kyi pandi ta
T02D1731:97b-14: chen po d'a na sh'i la'i gsung lhag chad med
